mapper.select: select s.user_name as userName, s.age as age, u.UserName as commendName, sd.job_status as jobStatus, s.arrival_time as arrivalTime, s.graduation_time as graduationTime, s.id, IFNULL(b.id, '0') as noSignUp from collect c left join hr_signup s on c.sign_up_id = s.id left join hr_signup_deliveryrecord sd on s.id = sd.signup_id and sd.delete_flag = 0 left join hr_user u on c.user_id = u.Id left join options o on s.relation = o.id left join hr_briefchapter b on c.briefchapter_id = b.Id and c.briefchapter_id = 2 where c.delete_flag = 0 and c.user_id = #{userId} order by c.create_time desc

select dii.name, s.user_name as userName, s.sex as sex, s.id_card as cardId, s.education as education, s.arrival_time as arrivalTime, s.graduation_time as graduationTime, s.expected_salary_lower as expectedSalaryLower, s.expected_salary_upper as expectedSalaryUpper, sd.job_status as jobStatus, ifnull(b.Id, 0) as noSignUp, s.relation as relation from collect c left join hr_signup s on c.sign_up_id = s.id left join hr_signup_deliveryrecord sd on s.id = sd.signup_id and sd.delete_flag = 0 left join hr_user u on c.user_id = u.Id and u.DeleteFlag = 0 left join hr_briefchapter b on c.briefchapter_id = b.Id and b.DeleteFlag = 0 left join hr_dictionary_item dii on b.PostId = dii.value and dii.status = 1 and dii.pId = 1 where c.delete_flag = 0

select u.UserName as user_name, u.HeadImage, s.sex, s.id_card, s.education, s.graduation_time, s.profession, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(d.name) FROM hr_dictionary_item d WHERE FIND_IN_SET(d.value, s.registration_position_id) and d.pId = 1) as Name, s.arrival_time, s.expected_salary_lower, s.expected_salary_upper, s.it_is_public, s.agree_platform_help, s.registration_position_id from hr_user u left join hr_signup s on u.Id = s.user_id
u.DeleteFlag = 0
and u.type = 1
and u.Id = #{userId}
